this is a very long active action thriller great movie. I'm not sure about funny quotes as the action was far more better and the greatest avengers of them all is my favorite who is Thor. the ending was good, but it didn't leave you hanging on to wanting to watch the last one which is the 4th installment. the hidden scene at the end of the movie is good, tho for sure this will be interesting as how this one female superhero will come to play as her solo movie comes out first. I sure do want to see how much more action against Thanos will be in the last installment and which superheroes will be in fighting mode and of course lastly be waiting for the most famous person to appear once again and that's the great Stan Lee as he's always knows how to make an entrance and say the best lines in his cameos.

Holy crap Marvel got alot of balls but this movie was fantastic and it truly was a roller coaster ride i recommend bringing a friend because after this movie you will want to gather you thoughts and just geek out. 5/5 been waiting for this movie and it was worth it

The Avengers and Guardians' (especially Gamora) portrayals were great.  Josh Brolin was fantastic as Thanos!  And it have a good balance between comedy and tragedy.  But they did put unnecessary comedy in dark moments.  And I would've liked it more if less characters died in the film.  But it left me wanting to see Avengers 4!
An absolute shellshock of an event, Infinity War is the comic-book blockbuster to the highest degree of entertainment. Absolutely masterful

This was a very good film, but not as good as I wanted it to be. Honestly, I think there should have been less characters. I love Marvelâ€™s character building moments, but there werenâ€™t many of those moments in this film. The only real character-building scene was the part where Thanos gets the soul stone. That is the only part of the film where I felt truly connected to any of the characters. Needless to say that this was still a very enjoyable film. Final Veridict : 8/10 80%

This movie took a sharp turn. It was much different than any other Marvel film we have seen with a darker tone which makes this film very unique from the rest. The Russo brothers did a great job with both writing and directing this huge film, being able to find a way to incorporate every character and giving us emotional scenes with everyone. A truly phenomenal movie. There are no others like this one!

This is defiantly the BEST Marvel film of ALLLLLLL time. The movie had me hooked from beginning to end, a feeling I cannot even describe. I am someone who suffers from OCD and was afraid that would ruin this experience I have been waiting for, for years. But the film was so extremely magnificent, with no words to explain it's awesomness, officialy making it the best MARVEL movie.

How much buzz did this film have and it still managed to exceed all expectations, The film starts off with a shocking yet great bang and hardly ever let's up, We FINALLY get introduced to Thanos properly and in the first 5 minutes he cements himself as the MCU's best villain and yet his grand plan although may be genocide has a good point and a meaning that some will understand why he's doing it, Unlike the comics they give Thanos a heart and in some scenes he doesn't come across all bad, All the superheroes get enough time to shine all 30+ of them and yet a few never make an appearance, But this movie is the Thanos show, The action was amazing and fast paced, At times there can be allot going on as there's a few stories happening at once but it's not hard to take in, The effects were amazing but we expect that now days, I can't comment on the 3D as I watched the 2D version, There's shocking scenes that some will never see coming and if you have read the Infinity Gauntlet comic then you know what all the Stones can do and yet we still get shocked at the end results in this film, The ending will be loved by the hardcore fans and hated by the casual fan but we will all leave knowing we've just watched the 10 year build up pay off in almost every way.
